pages.title: Kamen Rider Kekera
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/raise_riser_belt#raise_riser_belt_kekera)Raise Riser Belt$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Giant II$(li)Speed III$(li)Night Vision$(li)Haste$(li)Jump Boost IX
